sys_update_xml.name: sys_script_include_f36f3385db9697008798ffa31d961958
sys_update_xml.payload:
<?xml version="1.0" encoding="UTF-8"?><record_update table="sys_script_include"><sys_script_include action="INSERT_OR_UPDATE"><access>public</access><active>true</active><api_name>global.CloudPerformance</api_name><client_callable>false</client_callable><description/><name>CloudPerformance</name><script><![CDATA[var CloudPerformance = Class.create();
CloudPerformance.prototype = {
  initialize: function() {},

  getData: function() {
    var data = {
      widgetHeading: 'cloud performance',
      filter: 'all',
      firstBox: {
        number: '88%',
        bottomText: 'avg uptime'
      },
      secondBox: {
        number: '$1.2m',
        bottomText: 'revenue at risk'
      },
      thirdBox: {
        number: '17',
        bottomText: 'critical incident'
      }
    };
    return data;
  },

  type: 'CloudPerformance'
};
]]></script><sys_class_name>sys_script_include</sys_class_name><sys_created_by>steven.gregory</sys_created_by><sys_created_on>2018-05-24 16:06:48</sys_created_on><sys_customer_update>false</sys_customer_update><sys_id>f36f3385db9697008798ffa31d961958</sys_id><sys_mod_count>1</sys_mod_count><sys_name>CloudPerformance</sys_name><sys_package display_value="Global" source="global">global</sys_package><sys_policy/><sys_replace_on_upgrade>false</sys_replace_on_upgrade><sys_scope display_value="Global">global</sys_scope><sys_update_name>sys_script_include_f36f3385db9697008798ffa31d961958</sys_update_name><sys_updated_by>steven.gregory</sys_updated_by><sys_updated_on>2018-05-24 16:10:10</sys_updated_on></sys_script_include></record_update>

sys_update_xml.name: m2m_sp_widget_dependency_e10e2551db1e97008798ffa31d961937
sys_update_xml.payload: <?xml version="1.0" encoding="UTF-8"?><record_update table="m2m_sp_widget_dependency"><m2m_sp_widget_dependency action="INSERT_OR_UPDATE"><sp_dependency display_value="Cloud Performance">d4ad2151db1e97008798ffa31d96192e</sp_dependency><sp_widget display_value="PE Cloud Performance">9de33f01db9697008798ffa31d961903</sp_widget><sys_class_name>m2m_sp_widget_dependency</sys_class_name><sys_created_by>steven.gregory</sys_created_by><sys_created_on>2018-05-24 23:59:22</sys_created_on><sys_customer_update>false</sys_customer_update><sys_id>e10e2551db1e97008798ffa31d961937</sys_id><sys_mod_count>0</sys_mod_count><sys_name>Cloud Performance.PE Cloud Performance</sys_name><sys_package display_value="Global" source="global">global</sys_package><sys_policy/><sys_replace_on_upgrade>false</sys_replace_on_upgrade><sys_scope display_value="Global">global</sys_scope><sys_update_name>m2m_sp_widget_dependency_e10e2551db1e97008798ffa31d961937</sys_update_name><sys_updated_by>steven.gregory</sys_updated_by><sys_updated_on>2018-05-24 23:59:22</sys_updated_on></m2m_sp_widget_dependency></record_update>

sys_update_xml.name: sp_widget_9de33f01db9697008798ffa31d961903
sys_update_xml.payload:
<?xml version="1.0" encoding="UTF-8"?><record_update table="sp_widget"><sp_widget action="INSERT_OR_UPDATE"><category>custom</category><client_script><![CDATA[function CloudPerformanceController() {
  var c = this;

  c.$onInit = function() {
    setOptions();
  };

  function setOptions() {
    c.title = c.options.title && c.options.title.length > 0 ? c.options.title : c.data.cloudData.widgetHeading;
  }
}
]]></client_script><controller_as>c</controller_as><css>.cloud-performance-wrapper {
  .heading {
    background: #fff;
    p {
      margin-bottom: 0px;
      font-size: 14px;
      color: #2e2e2e;
      margin-left: 10px;
      margin-right: 10px;
      padding: 10px 0px 5px;
      border-bottom: 1px solid #e4e5e6;
      text-transform: uppercase;
      font-weight: bold;
    }
  }

  .vms {
    overflow: hidden;
    margin-bottom: 10px;
    background: #fff;
    display: flex;
    &:after {
      content: '';
      display: table;
    }
    .color-red {
      color: #ff402c !important;
    }
    .arrow-up {
      margin-right: 3px;
      width: 0;
      height: 0;
      border-left: 7px solid transparent;
      border-right: 7px solid transparent;
      border-bottom: 7px solid #70be5a;
    }
    .flex-it {
      display: flex;
      align-items: center;
      justify-content: center;
      color: #70be5a;
      p {
        font-size: 12px;
        font-weight: 600;
      }
    }
    .each-box {
      width: 33.3%;
      padding: 10px 10px 20px;
      float: left;
      text-align: center;
      .bottom-part {
        margin-left: -7px;
        margin-right: -7px;
      }
      .top-text {
        height: 34px;
        display: flex;
        align-items: flex-end;
        justify-content: center;
        margin-bottom: 8px;
      }
      .top-box {
        height: 65px;
        display: flex;
        align-items: flex-start;
        justify-content: center;
      }
      p {
        margin-bottom: 0px;
      }
      .sub-title {
        font-size: 12px;
        color: #9f9f9f;
        text-transform: uppercase;
        font-weight: bold;
      }
      .top-title {
        font-size: 12px;
        color: #65666a;
        text-transform: uppercase;
        font-weight: bold;
      }
      .middle-big-text {
        font-size: 38px;
        color: #65666a;
      }
    }
  }

  .cloud-performance {
    .each-box {
      .top-box {
        display: flex;
        align-items: center;
        .arrow-up-green {
          width: 0;
          height: 0;
          border-left: 10px solid transparent;
          border-right: 10px solid transparent;
          border-bottom: 10px solid #4fca86;
        }

        .arrow-up-red {
          width: 0;
          height: 0;
          border-left: 10px solid transparent;
          border-right: 10px solid transparent;
          border-bottom: 10px solid #ee525e;
        }
        .arrow-down-red {
          width: 0;
          height: 0;
          border-left: 10px solid transparent;
          border-right: 10px solid transparent;
          border-top: 10px solid #ee525e;
        }
        .middle-big-text {
          font-weight: 400;
          font-size: 32px;
        }
      }
      .top-title {
        font-size: 14px;
      }
    }
  }
}
</css><data_table>sp_instance</data_table><demo_data/><description/><docs/><field_list>title</field_list><has_preview>true</has_preview><id>pe-cloud-performance</id><internal>false</internal><link/><name>PE Cloud Performance</name><option_schema/><public>false</public><roles/><script><![CDATA[(function() {
  var cloudData = new CloudPerformance();
  data.cloudData = cloudData.getData();
})();
]]></script><servicenow>false</servicenow><sys_class_name>sp_widget</sys_class_name><sys_created_by>steven.gregory</sys_created_by><sys_created_on>2018-05-24 15:08:52</sys_created_on><sys_customer_update>false</sys_customer_update><sys_id>9de33f01db9697008798ffa31d961903</sys_id><sys_mod_count>54</sys_mod_count><sys_name>PE Cloud Performance</sys_name><sys_package display_value="Global" source="global">global</sys_package><sys_policy/><sys_replace_on_upgrade>false</sys_replace_on_upgrade><sys_scope display_value="Global">global</sys_scope><sys_update_name>sp_widget_9de33f01db9697008798ffa31d961903</sys_update_name><sys_updated_by>steven.gregory</sys_updated_by><sys_updated_on>2018-05-24 23:04:07</sys_updated_on><template><![CDATA[<cloud-performance data="{{::c.data.cloudData}}" options="{{::c.title}}"></cloud-performance>]]></template></sp_widget></record_update>

  angular.module('cloudPerformance', []);
